sub_fields.label: Mobile Image
sub_fields.name: mobile_image
sub_fields.instructions: If no image added, the landscape image will be used.

sub_fields.label: Button Type
sub_fields.name: button_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a button type in order to distinguish important actions from less important actions.

choices.normal: Smaller size, with one custom noodle bowl image
choices.large: Larger size, with alternating noodle bowl images

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: The image must be a round noodle bowl png image with no shadow.

sub_fields.label: Flip layout?
sub_fields.name: flip_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to switch the left/right alignment of the text/image

sub_fields.label: Display a map for which location?
sub_fields.name: location

sub_fields.label: Video Cover Image
sub_fields.name: cover_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an image to display while the video is loading

sub_fields.message: Update the images for all instances of this module from 'Marugame Options' > 'Social Media'
